title: Topshop typeface
content:
Hellooo  
Can anyone recognise this typeface please?  
Ta very much

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140930154110im_/http:/typophile.com/files/topshop_font_5504.jpg)
author: eoc

comments.content: Not really helpful but many letters remind me of [Avant-Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140930154110/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic) but some others such as /G and /R are definitely far away from it. May be a modified version of it, exclusively done for Topshop...
Thanks for this one too, Akira!
